name: Smint.io Portal Archive
summary: A SIPA file is an archive that contains assets, configuration files, and metadata exported from a Smint.io content portal. It is used to back up or transfer a portal's data. SIPA files are renamed .ZIP archives, so you can use any Zip-decompression utility to retrieve the files they contain.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

web.display_name: Rename .sipa to .zip ; open with any Zip-decompression utility

windows.display_name: Rename .sipa to .zip ; open with any Zip-decompression utility
